Supervisor/Manager: J, S. Wizand RSD Grovp: _Ligensee
Suggestion: Discontinue coal retention analyses on Licensee submitted

product samples. (Note: Coal Retention costing {s not
performed by most licensees. Other B&W physical
Reasurements as ends stability and inspection for soft
spots in cigarettes ere chought to be sufficient measures
to assure cigarette physical integrity. The proposed
action will increase laboratory productivity.)

Suggested Solution(s); Delete coal retention Erom the lise of standard

analyses performed on licensee submitted
product samples. Special requests for coat
Tetention testing could still be submitted on
an exception basis.

Mave you contacted your Managet/Supervisor? Yes Na

Manager Comments: Manager, please contact suggester and fotward
comments to the Quality Council.

Wizand RSD Grovp: _Ligensee Suggestion: Discontinue coal retention analyses on Licensee submitted product samples. (Note: Coal Retention costing {s not performed by most licensees. Other B&W physical Reasurements as ends stability and inspection for soft spots in cigarettes ere chought to be sufficient measures to assure cigarette physical integrity. The proposed action will increase laboratory productivity.) Suggested Solution(s); Delete coal retention Erom the lise of standard analyses performed on licensee submitted product samples. Special requests for coat Tetention testing could still be submitted on an exception basis. Mave you contacted your Managet/Supervisor?
